parameters.name: Name of analysis
parameters.help_text: The analysis to run on the input data

parameters.name: Version of analysis
parameters.help_text: The version of analysis that needs to be run

parameters.name: Libraries to track
parameters.description: The libraries that will be used in the analysis
parameters.help_text: Pass in a list of strings. See default in app builder

parameters.name: Parameters for analysis
parameters.description: The parameters that the analysis will use

parameters.name: Query
parameters.description: The query to fetch data from the document database
parameters.help_text: Query dictionary with fields to be specified

parameters.name: filter by extension
parameters.description: Look for the specified file extension in the bucket returned by the query

parameters.name: split files
parameters.description: Either group the files into one list if multiple files are returned for the file extension or split into single input per file
